name: Jamie
summary: A versatile, systems-driven technical professional with a unique blend of hardware operations, software engineering, and AI/ML innovation. Background spans high-stakes Civil Service data management, real-time VR systems administration, and full-stack development. Proven track record in maintaining complex hardware/software integrations, building production-ready AI applications, and delivering exceptional customer service. Combines a rigorous analytical mindset (BSc Chemistry) with a pragmatic, automation-first approach to problem-solving. Passionate about building operator-friendly solutions that bridge the gap between physical systems and modern cloud architecture.

experience.title: Lead VR Operative
achievements: Primary technical contact for full-body VR arena, maintaining HP & Optitrack equipment with 99.9% uptime
Responsible for training new staff on technical operations and customer service protocols
Achieved 5-star public review ratings for technical professionalism and service quality
Managed hardware inventory, thermal/power systems, and real-time networking diagnostics
Provided front-of-house customer service for busy indoor go-kart track, including NKA marshal training

experience.title: Customer Service Advisor (Seasonal)
achievements: Delivered high-quality customer service during peak festive period, maintaining GDPR compliance
Consistently achieved high call quality and handling time targets
Processed high-volume online orders with 100% data accuracy

experience.title: Service Desk Engineer (1st Line)
achievements: Provided 1st-line technical support in MSP environment for education and business clients
Administered Apple (Jamf Pro, trained to 200 level) and Microsoft environments via Partner portals
Managed and resolved support tickets through ServiceNow, ensuring SLA compliance
Handled Active Directory user management and device provisioning

experience.title: Higher Registration Executive
achievements: Middle-management role in Civil Service, responsible for registering complex land transactions
Made risk-based decisions on applications with higher technical authority
Trained and developed lower-grade employees through casework referral and training sessions
Ensured 100% data accuracy and integrity in high-stakes legal documentation
Delivered on KPIs of quality, speed, and integrity in a regulated environment

experience.title: Broadcast Assistant/Producer (Freelance)
achievements: Operated broadcast desks for live and recorded transmissions
Produced resources for on-air presenters and assisted with popular show production
Developed excellent grammar and copywriting skills for professional broadcast content

experience.title: Executive Producer & Presenter (Voluntary)
achievements: Executive producer for youth radio shows, guiding 16-18 year olds in producing professional-quality programmes
Regular on-air presenter for drivetime and breakfast shows

experience.title: Production Administrator
achievements: Primary administrator for small print business, processing incoming orders
Reduced admin error rates to an all-time low through improved processes
Deputised for production manager, managing end-to-end order fulfillment
Handled picking, packing, and dispatching of customer orders
Maintained accurate shipping records and liaised with logistics partners

skills.Frameworks: Next.js, React, FastAPI, LangChain, LlamaIndex, Convex, Tailwind CSS
skills.AI/ML: LLM Orchestration, OpenRouter, RAG, Multi-agent Workflows, Prompt Engineering, Tool Calling, JSON Schema Enforcement
skills.Cloud & DevOps: Azure AD Concepts, Microsoft 365, Entra ID, Git, Docker, Serverless Architecture, CI/CD
skills.Hardware & Networking: VR Systems (HP, Optitrack), Network Troubleshooting, Structured Cabling, Hardware Procurement, Device Compliance
skills.IT Support: CompTIA A+, Jamf Pro (200 level), Active Directory, SSO/OIDC, ServiceNow, SLA Management
skills.Data Management: Data Cleansing, GDPR Compliance, Data Analysis, Excel Advanced, Process Optimisation
skills.Soft Skills: Technical Documentation, Stakeholder Management, Training & Development, Customer Service, Broadcast Production

education.degree: A-Level Chemistry (A), Physics (B), Human Biology (C), AS Mathematics (B)
GCSEs: Maths (A*), Statistics (A), English Language (A), English Literature (B), Chemistry (A), Physics (B), Biology (B), Resistant Materials (B), Music (A), Drama (B), GNVQ Intermediate ICT (Merit)

tone_samples: Professional yet approachable, with a dry British wit
Direct about achievements with concrete metrics and outcomes
Pragmatic and systems-driven, allergic to corporate fluff
Clear communicator who can translate technical concepts for non-technical audiences
Honest about gaps and limitations, but confident in ability to learn and adapt
Friendly, curious, and creative problem-solver with a safety-first mindset
